Package com.cafean.client.values.util

Class ValueUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.values.util.ValueUtils
  • public class ValueUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Various constants and static methods used in the values package.

      • getRelativeFile

                                           java.io.File relativeTo)
        Returns a properly configured, relative File reference to the given file path.
        Parameters:

        filePath - the path to the file
